00020 #ifndef __TLM_REQ_RSP_CHANNELS_H__
00021 #define __TLM_REQ_RSP_CHANNELS_H__

00023 #include "tlm_core/tlm_1/tlm_req_rsp/tlm_adapters/tlm_adapters.h"
00024 #include "tlm_core/tlm_1/tlm_req_rsp/tlm_channels/tlm_fifo/tlm_fifo.h"

00027 namespace tlm {
00028 
00029 template < typename REQ , typename RSP ,
00030      typename REQ_CHANNEL = tlm_fifo<REQ> ,
00031      typename RSP_CHANNEL = tlm_fifo<RSP> >
00032 
00033 class tlm_req_rsp_channel : public sc_core::sc_module
00034 {
00035 public:
00036   // uni-directional slave interface
00037 
00038   sc_core::sc_export< tlm_fifo_get_if< REQ > > get_request_export;
00039   sc_core::sc_export< tlm_fifo_put_if< RSP > > put_response_export;
00040 
00041   // uni-directional master interface
00042 
00043   sc_core::sc_export< tlm_fifo_put_if< REQ > > put_request_export;
00044   sc_core::sc_export< tlm_fifo_get_if< RSP > > get_response_export;
00045 
00046   // master / slave interfaces
00047 
00048   sc_core::sc_export< tlm_master_if< REQ , RSP > > master_export;
00049   sc_core::sc_export< tlm_slave_if< REQ , RSP > > slave_export;
00050 
00051 
00052   tlm_req_rsp_channel( int req_size = 1 , int rsp_size = 1 ) :
00053     sc_core::sc_module( sc_core::sc_module_name( sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("tlm_req_rsp_channel") ) ) ,
00054     request_fifo( req_size ) ,
00055     response_fifo( rsp_size ) ,
00056     master( request_fifo , response_fifo ) ,
00057     slave( request_fifo , response_fifo )
00058   {
00059 
00060     bind_exports();
00061 
00062   }
00063 
00064   tlm_req_rsp_channel( sc_core::sc_module_name module_name ,
00065            int req_size = 1 , int rsp_size = 1 ) :
00066     sc_core::sc_module( module_name  ) ,
00067     request_fifo( req_size ) ,
00068     response_fifo( rsp_size ) ,
00069     master( request_fifo , response_fifo ) ,
00070     slave( request_fifo , response_fifo )
00071   {
00072 
00073     bind_exports();
00074 
00075   }
00076 
00077 private:
00078   void bind_exports() {
00079 
00080     put_request_export( request_fifo );
00081     get_request_export( request_fifo );
00082 
00083     put_response_export( response_fifo );
00084     get_response_export( response_fifo );
00085 
00086     master_export( master );
00087     slave_export( slave );
00088 
00089   }
00090 
00091 protected:
00092   REQ_CHANNEL request_fifo;
00093   RSP_CHANNEL response_fifo;
00094 
00095   tlm_master_imp< REQ , RSP > master;
00096   tlm_slave_imp< REQ , RSP > slave;
00097 };
00098 
00099 template < typename REQ , typename RSP ,
00100      typename REQ_CHANNEL = tlm_fifo<REQ> ,
00101      typename RSP_CHANNEL = tlm_fifo<RSP> >
00102 class tlm_transport_channel : public sc_core::sc_module
00103 {
00104 public:
00105 
00106   // master transport interface
00107 
00108   sc_core::sc_export< tlm_transport_if< REQ , RSP > > target_export;
00109 
00110   // slave interfaces
00111 
00112   sc_core::sc_export< tlm_fifo_get_if< REQ > > get_request_export;
00113   sc_core::sc_export< tlm_fifo_put_if< RSP > > put_response_export;
00114 
00115   sc_core::sc_export< tlm_slave_if< REQ , RSP > > slave_export;
00116 
00117   tlm_transport_channel() :
00118     sc_core::sc_module( sc_core::sc_module_name( sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name("transport_channel" ) ) ) ,
00119     target_export("target_export") ,
00120     req_rsp( "req_rsp" , 1 , 1 ) ,
00121     t2m("ts2m")
00122   {
00123     do_binding();
00124   }
00125 
00126   tlm_transport_channel( sc_core::sc_module_name nm ) :
00127     sc_core::sc_module( nm ) ,
00128     target_export("target_export") ,
00129     req_rsp( "req_rsp" , 1 , 1 ) ,
00130     t2m("tsm" )
00131   {
00132     do_binding();
00133   }
00134 
00135 private:
00136   void do_binding() {
00137 
00138     target_export( t2m.target_export );
00139 
00140     t2m.master_port( req_rsp.master_export );
00141 
00142     get_request_export( req_rsp.get_request_export );
00143     put_response_export( req_rsp.put_response_export );
00144     slave_export( req_rsp.slave_export );
00145 
00146   }
00147 
00148   tlm_req_rsp_channel< REQ , RSP , REQ_CHANNEL , RSP_CHANNEL > req_rsp;
00149   tlm_transport_to_master< REQ , RSP > t2m;
00150 
00151 };
00152 
00153 } // namespace tlm
